title: Morde's W should be self castable to it's full effect
body:
It won't break him, it would just allow him to duel better in the jungle or when roaming. Botlane Morde is weak and his kit really shouldn't be balanced around it at all imo. Plus this change could make jungle Morde a thing.
{{sticker:sg-poppy}}

replies.body: agree, he's so garbage right now that something has to be done to make him not shit while he's alone

I believe that they are afraid to tamper with Mordekaider... if anyone remembers his original kit - he was an undying beast. Add Torment to the mix, and Morde became a terror.

That said, his 'new' W was simply not that great a skill to even give the champion. It makes little sense for him, and they only did it because they made Spellvamp a mid game purchase and broke his ability to sustain.

The honest hope is that when he receives a VGU that they rework him. At this stage he lacks the early sustain he used to enjoy, and has been turned into a tank without CC - nor the sustain of tanks like Mundo.

This would be so nice

But they won’t do it

Even a compromise where it’ll still function albeit at a reduced damage when alone would be better than nothing
